Roll twice and use the better result on your first attack roll.
Effect: Guiding Words.name: Effect: Guiding Words

Effect: Gunpowder Gauntlet.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.FbzbZc4LGUTcz9tA]{Gunpowder Gauntlet}

You take a penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than the origin.
Effect: Gunpowder Gauntlet.name: Effect: Gunpowder Gauntlet

Effect: Hag Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.O0uXZRWMNliDbkxU]{Bloodline: Hag}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank.
Effect: Hag Blood Magic.name: Effect: Hag Blood Magic

Effect: Hamstringing Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s2GbcUIXG1ZBurSd]{Hamstringing Strike}

You take a -5-foot status penalty to Speed. On a Critical Hit, you take a -10-foot status penalty to Speed.
Effect: Hamstringing Strike.name: Effect: Hamstringing Strike

Effect: Harbinger's Armament.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KuLH3nG3chToIffB]{Harbinger's Armament}

Select one weapon or handwraps of mighty blows. It gains the effect of one property rune. Choose either fearsome, ghost touch, returning, shifting, or vitalizing.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Z91dIlVcJXoicbHj]{Greater Armament}, add brilliant, corrosive, flaming, frost, holy, shock, thundering, and unholy.
Effect: Harbinger's Armament.name: Effect: Harbinger's Armament

Effect: Harden Flesh.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.REgTwIVgI3j1FQiJ]{Harden Flesh}

You gain resistance 3 to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of your next turn.
Effect: Harden Flesh.name: Effect: Harden Flesh

Effect: Harrow Omen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0i4zOM1p0rFxnc5m]{Harrower Dedication}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JoZRbbexF3epeREe]{Benevolent Spirit Deck}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nqEqvZviKYuGVxLV]{Restore Omen}

Draw a card from your harrow deck—that card's suit becomes your active harrow omen.
Effect: Harrow Omen.name: Effect: Harrow Omen

Effect: Harrow the Fiend.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EuoCFSHTzi0VOfuf]{Harrow the Fiend}

You gain a +1 status bonus on all Strikes or spell attack rolls against fiends.
Effect: Harrow the Fiend.name: Effect: Harrow the Fiend

Effect: Harrow-Chosen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.backgrounds.Item.X1YhwDic2ugT9RuQ]{Harrow-Chosen}

This benefit is determined by alignment of the card you draw from the deck. The card can match both alignment components with yours (true match), match a single alignment component with yours (partial match), have no matching alignment components (unmatched), or have a diametrically opposed alignment to yours (misaligned).

True match: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to a saving throw of your choice (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will) for 1 minute.

Partial match: You gain resistance to one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) equal to your level for 1 minute.

Unmatched: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level. The temporary Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

Misaligned: You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to your Speeds for 1 minute.
Effect: Harrow-Chosen.name: Effect: Harrow-Chosen

Effect: Harsh Judgement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.37uOb0iaWCfTCvBZ]{Harsh Judgement}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.
Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: Effect: Harsh Judgement

Effect: Harvest Blood.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.GrzbczH9S3SHPiIQ]{Harvest Blood}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier, and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against that creature's spells.
Effect: Harvest Blood.name: Effect: Harvest Blood

Effect: Hasty Celebration.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Rb3ndqSyDUa6KvOL]{Hasty Celebration}

You grant all allies within 60 feet a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and damage, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to all enemies.
Effect: Hasty Celebration.name: Effect: Hasty Celebration

Effect: Healer of the World.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.xSgUH97WkWadielz]{Healer of the World}

You gain 10 temporary Hit Points.
Effect: Healer of the World.name: Effect: Healer of the World

Effect: Healing Sanctuary.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cD5EsurWVYekIXkz]{Healing Sanctuary}

You gain 10 temporary Hit Points.
Effect: Healing Sanctuary.name: Effect: Healing Sanctuary

Effect: Heaven's Thunder.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]{Heaven's Thunder}

Your unarmed attacks and any monk weapons you wield deal additional electricity and sonic damage; the amount of each damage type is equal to the number of damage dice for the weapon or unarmed attack.

If you also know the qi blast qi spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force (qi blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead).
Effect: Heaven's Thunder.name: Effect: Heaven's Thunder

Effect: Helpful Tinkering.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qUSWPWxYF8gfhfHM]{Helpful Tinkering}

Your strikes with the chosen weapon gain the same offensive boost your inventor ally's innovation has.
Effect: Helpful Tinkering.name: Effect: Helpful Tinkering

Effect: Herald's Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5ELeiNtEDgXfBcwt]{Herald's Weapon}

Your chosen weapon or unarmed attack deals spirit damage instead of its regular damage, it gains the sanctified trait, and deals an additional 2d4 spirit damage.
Effect: Herald's Weapon.name: Effect: Herald's Weapon

Effect: Heroes' Call.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7cM7uKRKQDWz5eeu]{Heroes' Call}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.
Effect: Heroes' Call.name: Effect: Heroes' Call

Effect: Heroic Defiance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.81jVmGF9Uo9dp2dI]{Heroic Defiance}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level and a +1 status bonus to all saving throws.
Effect: Heroic Defiance.name: Effect: Heroic Defiance

Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed, and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.
Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: Effect: Heroic Recovery

Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xDTjr415ZZM8x2WW]{High-Speed Regeneration}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.
Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.name: Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Boost

Effect: Hone Claws.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GU3EQVOMjD9S2YWj]{Hone Claws}

Your claws deal an additional 1d6 bleed damage.
Effect: Hone Claws.name: Effect: Hone Claws

Effect: Hopeful Athamaru.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.heritages.Item.yEQSw61sNRvgPy4T]{Hopeful Athamaru}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fear.
Effect: Hopeful Athamaru.name: Effect: Hopeful Athamaru

Effect: Hot Foot (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dtPXuS8MiWrz5UNK]{Hot Foot}

You are off-guard and take a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves.
Effect: Hot Foot (Critical Success).name: Effect: Hot Foot (Critical Success)

Effect: Howling Aspect.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rb0GCneYEzBi2LGr]{Howling Aspect}

You gain a tusks melee unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage, is in the brawling group, and has the finesse and unarmed traits. You also gain a flame-hair melee unarmed attack that deals 1d4 fire damage, is in the brawling group, and has the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.
Effect: Howling Aspect.name: Effect: Howling Aspect

Effect: Hungry Goblin.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DnfVQGLk3PAl8UWh]{Hungry Goblin}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.
Effect: Hungry Goblin.name: Effect: Hungry Goblin

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Flurry} edge with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Outwit} edge with you.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the prey, and a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against your prey's attacks.
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Precision} edge with you.

The first time you hit your hunted prey in a round, you also deal 1d8 additional precision damage.

At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision

Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.34E7k2YRcsOU5uyl]{Change Shape}.

In hybrid shape, you appear as a mix between your ancestry and your inherent animal. While in hybrid shape, you gain a jaws unarmed Strike resembling the features of your inherent animal (fangs for bats, beaks for eagles, mandibles for wasps, and so on). Your jaws deal 1d4 piercing damage, have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits, and are in the brawling weapon group.
Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).name: Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin)

Effect: Hydraulic Deflection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.kqRFoXfErUFEndIs]{Hydraulic Deflection}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Hydraulic Deflection.name: Effect: Hydraulic Deflection

Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ZEtJJ5UOlV5oTWWp]{Bloodline: Imperial}

You gain your choice of either a +1 status bonus to AC or a +1 status bonus to saving throws.
Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.name: Effect: Imperial Blood Magic

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{Improved Poison Weapon}.
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Improved Poison Weapon

Effect: Indomitable Spirit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.v84501yLBubHlGPz]{Indomitable Spirit}

You get a +4 circumstance bonus to AC and are quickened. The additional action can be used to Strike or Stride.
Effect: Indomitable Spirit.name: Effect: Indomitable Spirit

Effect: Inertial Barrier.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Nm4yeoJVXRy0Wyth]{Inertial Barrier}

You or one target of the spell gains resistance to physical damage equal to 2 + the spell's rank until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Inertial Barrier.name: Effect: Inertial Barrier

Effect: Infused with Belkzen's Might.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DaRfJsWAivah3a07]{Infused with Belkzen's Might}

You deal additional spirit damage with weapons and unarmed attacks equal to 1 plus half the number of Tattooed Historian feats you have.
Effect: Infused with Belkzen's Might.name: Effect: Infused with Belkzen's Might

Effect: Inspired Stratagem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ZXvJGxMJc0HRpcQh]{Inspired Stratagem}

You roll the triggering check twice and take the better of the two results.
Effect: Inspired Stratagem.name: Effect: Inspired Stratagem

Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.
Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance

Effect: Inspiring Resilience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AbsqV1P8OAhChcRl]{Inspiring Resilience}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.
Effect: Inspiring Resilience.name: Effect: Inspiring Resilience

Effect: Inventive Offensive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SrSYEHqOLXWuj65e]{Inventive Offensive}

When you use this ability, add one of the following weapon traits to a melee weapon you wield: deadly d6, disarm, nonlethal, shove, trip, versatile B, versatile P, or versatile S. You cannot add a trait that the weapon already has. The weapon retains this trait until you a successfully hit and deal damage with the weapon. The weapon retains this trait only while you wield it, and you can have only one weapon modified in this way at any time.

If you have legendary proficiency in Crafting, you can apply two weapon traits from the list when using this feat.
Effect: Inventive Offensive.name: Effect: Inventive Offensive

Effect: Invigorating Breath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.23QgyEYjoslBvkra]{Invigorating Breath}

You gain 20 temporary Hit Points. At 15th level, you instead gain 30 temporary Hit Points.
Effect: Invigorating Breath.name: Effect: Invigorating Breath

Effect: Invoke Defense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iBdvNOWazhiXeUUa]{Invoke Defense}

Choose bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing. You gain resistance equal to half your level to that damage type.
Effect: Invoke Defense.name: Effect: Invoke Defense

Effect: Invoke Movement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7ZYw4SiBLBbbICNs]{Invoke Movement}

You gain a burrow, climb, fly or swim speed.
Effect: Invoke Movement.name: Effect: Invoke Movement

Effect: Invoke Offense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EEtezGRTZSHayQDR]{Invoke Offense}

You gain an unarmed attack that deals 1d8 spirit damage for the duration of your spirit trance.This unarmed attack is in the brawling weapon group and has the agile, finesse, and magical traits.

At 5th level, this unarmed attack gains the benefits of a striking rune. At 12th level, this unarmed attack gains the benefits of a greater striking rune. At 20th level, this unarmed attack gains the benefits of a major striking rune.
Effect: Invoke Offense.name: Effect: Invoke Offense

Effect: Juvenile Flight.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu]{Fledgling Flight}, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.
Effect: Juvenile Flight.name: Effect: Juvenile Flight

Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ySeT8hrMEPF9AsQu]{Kindle Inner Flames}

You gain a status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.
Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.name: Effect: Kindle Inner Flames

Effect: Kindling.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.gVPtUSEPZYGRIRyQ]{Kindling}

You gain a status bonus to the damage of a spell that has the fire trait equal to twice the spell rank.
Effect: Kindling.name: Effect: Kindling

Effect: Kinetic Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.g8QrV39TmZfkbXgE]{Channel Elements}

You activate your kinetic aura.
Effect: Kinetic Aura.name: Effect: Kinetic Aura

Effect: Kishin Rage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zknpo51jJndv68Ph]{Kishin Rage}

You gain 40 temporary Hit Points, a fly Speed equal to your Speed, and your horns deal an additional 1d4 electricity damage.
Effect: Kishin Rage.name: Effect: Kishin Rage

Effect: Kneecap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1muxLx8Vacn2SLHc]{Kneecap}

The target takes a status penalty to its Speed.
Effect: Kneecap.name: Effect: Kneecap

Effect: Known Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8]{Known Weaknesses}.

Your ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject of known weakness, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.
Effect: Known Weakness.name: Effect: Known Weakness

Effect: Lava Leap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OFCeTaAX99YbXOu0]{Lava Leap}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Lava Leap.name: Effect: Lava Leap

Effect: Leech-Clip.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OZtoTusMmCJymObT]{Leech-Clip}

You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speed (or a –15-foot status penalty on a critical hit).
Effect: Leech-Clip.name: Effect: Leech-Clip

Effect: Left-Hand Blood.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7XA3Hm2md2tU9pEz]{Left-Hand Blood}

If you hit with the weapon and deal damage, the target also takes 1d4 persistent poison damage.
Effect: Left-Hand Blood.name: Effect: Left-Hand Blood

Effect: Legendary Monster.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DmpJgLsHfv1kMcJc]{Legendary Monster}

When you Unleash Yaoguai Might, you can gain one of the following additional benefits.

  • Your body grows to impossible heights. Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} effect is heightened to 4th rank.
  • Your spiritual power erupts to punish your enemies. You deal an additional 1d4 spirit damage with all Strikes and attack spells, and your Strikes and attack spells gain the spirit trait.
  • You can leap off the air itself. You gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly} spell.
Effect: Legendary Monster.name: Effect: Legendary Monster

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Warden

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Granted by Esoteric Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Granted by Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Granted by Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Granted by Shining Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)

Effect: Life-Draining.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.XIk9Z4cLsoJRyV0T]{Life-Draining}

Mild Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} as the plants feed off your life force. This condition lasts until you spend 3 consecutive actions to rest and do nothing.

Moderate Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} until you spend 20 minutes recuperating by resting and doing nothing. If you spend this time basking in sunshine, it instead takes 10 minutes.

Severe Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} until you spend 2 hours napping. While napping, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} and can't take actions or engage in exploration activities, but a creature can wake you with a single action with the manipulate trait. If you spend this time napping in natural sunlight, it instead takes 1 hour. You're fatigued until you can get a full night's rest.
Effect: Life-Draining.name: Effect: Life-Draining

Effect: Life-Giving Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hSzNtRNwrma81Eeq]{Life-Giving Magic}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.
Effect: Life-Giving Magic.name: Effect: Life-Giving Magic

Effect: Lightning Armillary.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.zwWgHjcU0iZ6gUDY]{Lightning Armillary}

Your weapon or hand deals an additional 1d6 electricity damage, or 1d8 electricity damage.
Effect: Lightning Armillary.name: Effect: Lightning Armillary

Effect: Living Fortification.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.9MJcQEMVVrmMyGyq]{Living Fortification}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Living Fortification.name: Effect: Living Fortification

Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.9MJcQEMVVrmMyGyq]{Living Fortification}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.name: Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trait)

Effect: Living for the Applause.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CL43gGiErw5FUtFQ]{Living for the Applause}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Living for the Applause.name: Effect: Living for the Applause

Effect: Lock On.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.McnLGEZnUbtYCNDW]{Lock On}

You gain a circumstance bonus to attack rolls against the designated enemy.
Effect: Lock On.name: Effect: Lock On

Effect: Lord of the Fiends.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.apz0n3Q3gWvQVChT]{Lord of the Fiends}

Whenever you roll a success on a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check against a fiend, you get a critical success instead.
Effect: Lord of the Fiends.name: Effect: Lord of the Fiends

Effect: Lost in the Crowd.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth check when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures or a +4 circumstance bonus when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.
Effect: Lost in the Crowd.name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd

Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-rank spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-rank spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**
Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)

Effect: Maiden's Mending.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Hmgy0GJKIawAiqHE]{Maiden's Mending}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.
Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: Effect: Maiden's Mending

Effect: Manifest Realm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IfWF56KiSFQbNmHj]{Manifest Realm}

You take a –1 penalty to Fortitude saving throws.
Effect: Manifest Realm.name: Effect: Manifest Realm

Effect: Marked for Rebuke.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.k8c0E7YyeIQJjRzB]{Marked for Rebuke}

You gain weakness 10 to all damage.
Effect: Marked for Rebuke.name: Effect: Marked for Rebuke

Effect: Marshal's Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MYzRfNExDYp25rro]{Marshal Dedication}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.
Effect: Marshal's Aura.name: Effect: Marshal's Aura

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{Masterful Hunter (Outwit)} with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{Masterful Hunter (Precision)} with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1d8 precision damage.

At 19th level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2d8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1d8 precision damage.
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision

Effect: Meddling Futures.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.y8l4omYxEWH7vihP]{Meddling Futures}

Roll 1d4 to see what type of spirit is drawn to you. You gain the listed benefit for the action. If you attempt to use a different action, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:6] or the action is lost.

1 Warrior You must attempt a Strike. You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack roll and a +2 status bonus to damage, or a +6 status bonus to damage if you are at least cursebound 3.

2 Adept You must attempt a Perception check or a skill action. You gain a +1 status bonus to the check, or a +2 status bonus if you are cursebound 3.

3 Sage You must attempt to Cast a Spell. You gain a status bonus to the spell's damage or healing equal to the spell's rank, or equal to the spell's rank + 3 if you are at least cursebound 3.

4 Wanderer You must attempt a Stride action, or a Fly, Climb, or Burrow action if you have the relevant speed. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed for the action, or a +20-foot status bonus if you are at least cursebound 3.
Effect: Meddling Futures.name: Effect: Meddling Futures

Effect: Memory of Skill.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7UDWeLq8OAL04gHR]{Memory of Skill}

You temporarily increase your proficiency rank with that skill by one step.
Effect: Memory of Skill.name: Effect: Memory of Skill

Effect: Mental Balm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pEFcWRYiWLSjxvkW]{Mental Balm}

You or one ally within 30 feet gains a +2 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects for 1 minute.
Effect: Mental Balm.name: Effect: Mental Balm

Effect: Mentor of Legends.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JBjRGWVtVaxLckfH]{Mentor of Legends}

The target gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.
Effect: Mentor of Legends.name: Effect: Mentor of Legends

Effect: Metallic Skin.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.syyT2xBA4H72TpOt]{Metallic Skin}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and resistance 10 to physical damage (except adamantine), but you take a –10-foot penalty to Speed. If you take fire damage while this ability is active, until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional 2d6 fire damage with all your unarmed melee Strikes.
Effect: Metallic Skin.name: Effect: Metallic Skin

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CkK7WwaWnrLXK9sW]{Methodical Debilitations}

You cannot gain a circumstance bonus to AC from Raising a Shield, lesser cover, or standard cover.
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover)

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CkK7WwaWnrLXK9sW]{Methodical Debilitations}

You are unable to flank or provide flanking.
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanking)

Effect: Mirrored Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.lJAQPRT2t8IABR4v]{Mirrored Aegis}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.
Effect: Mirrored Aegis.name: Effect: Mirrored Aegis

Effect: Moisture Bath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IwETJ7fhszmlNo7X]{Moisture Bath}

You gain fire and cold resistance equal to half your level.
Effect: Moisture Bath.name: Effect: Moisture Bath

Effect: Monarch Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IzNyByUBNH94MDOr]{Fey Ascension}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed while you've manifested your wings.
Effect: Monarch Wings.name: Effect: Monarch Wings

Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.
Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Monster Hunter

Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.
Effect: Monster Warden.name: Effect: Monster Warden

Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UFn85K7uDsZj5Hep]{Mountain Strategy}

Marks a target that critically hit you.
Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.name: Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hit)

Effect: Mountain Stronghold.description: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.
Effect: Mountain Stronghold.name: Effect: Mountain Stronghold

Effect: Multifaceted Will.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.LBfLDfLnCFn1iy5h]{Multifaceted Will}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against spells with the chosen tradition trait.
Effect: Multifaceted Will.name: Effect: Multifaceted Will

Effect: Mutate Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SWNmYaj0OSPhhIqO]{Mutate Weapon}

The damage die for the attack you gained with Living Weapon increases by one step. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack.
Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: Effect: Mutate Weapon

Effect: Mythic Allies.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lx7JtAhIn3aJ6WbP]{Mythic Allies}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your attack rolls, defenses, and a number of additional Hit Points equal to the origin's level. The next Strike you make gains a +4 circumstance bonus to the attack roll.
Effect: Mythic Allies.name: Effect: Mythic Allies

Effect: Mythic Allies (Circumstance Bonu.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lx7JtAhIn3aJ6WbP]{Mythic Allies}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll.
Effect: Mythic Allies (Circumstance Bonu.name: Effect: Mythic Allies (Circumstance Bonus)

Effect: Nanite Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

Your circuitry glows, lighting a @Template[emanation|distance:10] with dim light for 1 round.
Effect: Nanite Surge.name: Effect: Nanite Surge

Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering skill check.
Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).name: Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus)

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.5Wxjghw7lHuCxjZz]{Bloodline: Nymph}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks or a -1 status penalty on one target's Will saves for 1 round.
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic

Effect: Oath of the Defender.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.imBsp1Tg7KMut4Lf]{Oath of the Defender}

You gain resistance to damage dealt by creatures with the chosen trait.
Effect: Oath of the Defender.name: Effect: Oath of the Defender

Effect: Offensive Boost.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.F8oXHnu9iNTcpXbJ]{Offensive Boost}

Your improvements make any Strikes that rely on your innovation deal an additional 1d6 damage, with a type determined by the boost you choose. If your innovation is armor, the boost applies to your melee Strikes with one weapon you choose during daily preparations; if your innovation is a construct, the boost applies to your construct companion's Strikes.
Effect: Offensive Boost.name: Effect: Offensive Boost

Effect: One Moment till Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IEBBHnI7wWRt44KG]{One Moment till Glory}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throw.
Effect: One Moment till Glory.name: Effect: One Moment till Glory

Effect: One with the Spirits.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OxdlGZ1rndxalf6X]{One with the Spirits}

You gain fast healing 5 and you become concealed. Your Strikes gain the benefits of a ghost touch property rune. Whenever you deal damage with a Strike, you can choose to have that Strike deal spirit damage, rather than its usual damage type.
Effect: One with the Spirits.name: Effect: One with the Spirits

Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MRMW0EiuOO20pzG2]{Ongoing Selfishness}

You gain resistance to all further damage from the triggering enemy until the end of the turn on which you used the reaction. This resistance is equal to half your Selfish Shield resistance.
Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.name: Effect: Ongoing Selfishness

Effect: Oni Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iCNNMJeGvsIzza4A]{Oni Form}

Your size increases to Large, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}. This doesn't change your Speed, reach, or other statistics except as noted here.
Effect: Oni Form.name: Effect: Oni Form

Effect: Only You and I.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.8r9ePG6BnrnO6YE1]{Only You and I}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls made against the exemplar. Whenever you miss the exemplar with a Strike, they heal 1d8+5 Hit Points.
Effect: Only You and I.name: Effect: Only You and I

Effect: Oracular Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gcliatty0MGYbTVV]{Oracular Warning}

Each ally gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.
Effect: Oracular Warning.name: Effect: Oracular Warning

Effect: Oracular Warning (Initiative).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gcliatty0MGYbTVV]{Oracular Warning}

Each ally gains a +2 status bonus to their initiative roll. If you are cursebound 2 when you use Oracular Warning, the bonus increases to +3, and if you are cursebound 3, the bonus increases to +4.
Effect: Oracular Warning (Initiative).name: Effect: Oracular Warning (Initiative)

Effect: Orchard's Endurance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cbEodcnBKzx5ii3B]{Orchard's Endurance}

You gain resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage. In addition, you roll flat checks to recover from persistent damage twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.
Effect: Orchard's Endurance.name: Effect: Orchard's Endurance

Effect: Overdrive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3D9kGfwg4LUZBR9A]{Overdrive}

Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Effect: Overdrive.name: Effect: Overdrive

Effect: Overdrive Ally.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NBvhmNqneeok7ZOr]{Overdrive Ally}

Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier, or your full Intelligence modifier if you were in critical overdrive.
Effect: Overdrive Ally.name: Effect: Overdrive Ally

Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U0XX0Mm2MbZcuNK2]{Shared Overdrive}

The first time you use Overdrive Ally during a given Overdrive, the effect lasts for the remainder of the duration of your Overdrive, instead of just until the end of the target's next turn.
Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.name: Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive)

Effect: Overextending Feint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9CaaU5szcf3mtJXD]{Overextending Feint}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against the opponent.
Effect: Overextending Feint.name: Effect: Overextending Feint

Effect: Overwatch Field.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.t03Tc5I4B8RHsyqs]{Overwatch Dedication}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.
Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Effect: Overwatch Field

Effect: Packed with Flavor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U1EMvL3PbEQZXqLy]{Packed with Flavor}

You gain temporary Hit Points.
Effect: Packed with Flavor.name: Effect: Packed with Flavor

Effect: Pain is Temporary.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.j5VRy2iVz5aulQ1h]{Pain is Temporary}

You gain resistance 10 to all damage.
Effect: Pain is Temporary.name: Effect: Pain is Temporary

Effect: Pale Horse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qPlv8HwtoO2fAjkj]{Pale Horse}

You gain resistance 10 to fire, poison, or void damage.
Effect: Pale Horse.name: Effect: Pale Horse

Effect: Panache.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}

You gain panache by performing actions that have the bravado trait.
Effect: Panache.name: Effect: Panache

Effect: Path of the Tempest.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.O0XJIvMGK36yg9TJ]{Path of the Tempest}

Your familiar summons winds that speed up and protect you. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your turn. When you Stride this turn, you don't trigger reactions. In addition, you don't need to Stride before a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} this turn.
Effect: Path of the Tempest.name: Effect: Path of the Tempest

Effect: Perfect Resistance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QN55ToyJIjxgPmhs]{Perfect Resistance}

After using a Student of Perfection ki spell, the resistance increases to be equal to your level for 1 round.
Effect: Perfect Resistance.name: Effect: Perfect Resistance

Effect: Phenom Verve.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4YqmeJQwnrG1Lg07]{Phenom's Verve}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with one-handed firearms and one-handed melee weapons.
Effect: Phenom Verve.name: Effect: Phenom Verve

Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.TWR1wbPJuCLnGdFZ]{Bloodline: Phoenix}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank.
Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.name: Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic

Effect: Pinpoint Poisoner.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XtIPmZ3Ihq5NJHP2]{Pinpoint Poisoner}

The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.
Effect: Pinpoint Poisoner.name: Effect: Pinpoint Poisoner

Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yOyMlFGAgLfRas8m]{Pistolero's Challenge}

Both you and the opponent gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with Strikes made against each other. If you're a master in the skill you used for the check, the status bonus to damage rolls increases to +3, and if you're legendary, it increases to +4.
Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.name: Effect: Pistolero's Challenge

Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}.
Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Poison Weapon

Effect: Portentous Spell.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rRbMOxX1QTHIIwAi]{Portentous Spell}.

Any creature that attempts to use a reaction triggered by your Cast a Spell activity takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and skill checks rolled as part of the reaction.
Effect: Portentous Spell.name: Effect: Portentous Spell

Effect: Portents of the Haruspex.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tz0gvfTwcDq0yEfg]{Portents of the Haruspex}

Roll 1d12 to determine the damage type. The next time before the end of your next turn that you or your allies deals that damage type to an enemy, that enemy has weakness equal to your level against that damage.
Effect: Portents of the Haruspex.name: Effect: Portents of the Haruspex

Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2qR4QAgJVArv63Z2]{Prayer-Touched Weapon}

The chosen weapon deals an extra 1d6 vitality damage.
Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon

Effect: Precious Ammunition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MlxfNv98LZKfYl64]{Precious Ammunition}

Choose cold iron or silver; if you shoot the arrow or bolt before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14th level, add adamantine to the list of materials you can choose from.
Effect: Precious Ammunition.name: Effect: Precious Ammunition

Effect: Precise Debilitations.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wvJBIzgS298ZRp6w]{Precise Debilitations}

The target takes an additional 2d6 precision damage from your attacks.
Effect: Precise Debilitations.name: Effect: Precise Debilitations

Effect: Predictable!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{Predictable!}

You gain a circumstance bonus to AC and your next saving throw against the target. On a critical failure, you take a –1 circumstance penalty instead.
Effect: Predictable!.name: Effect: Predictable!

Effect: Predictable! (Saving Throw).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{Predictable}

You gain a circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against the target. On a critical failure, you take a –1 circumstance penalty instead.
Effect: Predictable! (Saving Throw).name: Effect: Predictable! (Saving Throw)

Effect: Premonition of Clarity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2h8a6pKhXTXwpJjP]{Premonition of Clarity}

Reroll the triggering saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.
Effect: Premonition of Clarity.name: Effect: Premonition of Clarity

Effect: Prepare Elemental Medicine.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NMbOfl885pn0Yzu9]{Prepare Elemental Medicine}

You gain a circumstance bonus to saves against an affliction, or a –1 circumstance penalty on a critical failure.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qaiwbAb1PaKrZ2O0]{Energy Fortification} and use Occultism to Prepare Elemental Medicine, the recipient gains resistance and weakness to vitality damage and void damage based on the element you chose.
Effect: Prepare Elemental Medicine.name: Effect: Prepare Elemental Medicine

Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.
Effect: Prevailing Position.name: Effect: Prevailing Position

Effect: Pride in Arms.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CCY6VsGjp5fdmM6K]{Pride in Arms}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier.
Effect: Pride in Arms.name: Effect: Pride in Arms

Effect: Primal Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AbjVJIBdNjbQbVnV]{Primal Aegis}

You gain resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, vitality, and void damage.
Effect: Primal Aegis.name: Effect: Primal Aegis

Effect: Propulsive Leap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.q8c0LINVNcJrdK91]{Propulsive Leap}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.
Effect: Propulsive Leap.name: Effect: Propulsive Leap

Effect: Protective Cycle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7G1gMSHyMdMGMsF9]{Protective Cycle}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Protective Cycle.name: Effect: Protective Cycle

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)

Effect: Protective Pose.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.A9WrbBCCdYsmdKGv]{Protective Pose}

You gain resistance to either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage equal to half the origin's level.
Effect: Protective Pose.name: Effect: Protective Pose

Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]{Protective Spirit Mask}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the caster's next turn.
Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.name: Effect: Protective Spirit Mask

Effect: Proud Mentor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vD3l0Xn4hb7xnQic]{Proud Mentor}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.
Effect: Proud Mentor.name: Effect: Proud Mentor

Effect: Psi Strikes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uisI6b7Ua5zSHDwj]{Psi Strikes}

The attack deals an extra 1d6 force damage.
Effect: Psi Strikes.name: Effect: Psi Strikes

Effect: Psychic Rapport.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]{Psychic Rapport}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to Sense Motive.
Effect: Psychic Rapport.name: Effect: Psychic Rapport

Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PpzH9tJULk5ksX9w]{Bloodline: Psychopomp}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.
Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self)

Effect: Purifying Breeze.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.k42ntHdg70ZMEKrs]{Purifying Breeze}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.
Effect: Purifying Breeze.name: Effect: Purifying Breeze

Effect: Push Back the Dead!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BtZJJClWCpc31Ven]{Push Back the Dead!}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead. You also gain resistance to damage from Strikes made by undead creatures.
Effect: Push Back the Dead!.name: Effect: Push Back the Dead!

Effect: Pushing Wind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GxkTe4VM7u26uZGI]{Pushing Wind}

You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to land Speed.
Effect: Pushing Wind.name: Effect: Pushing Wind

Effect: Race the Skies.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MrTULCUsE9naPxXg]{Race the Skies}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.
Effect: Race the Skies.name: Effect: Race the Skies

Effect: Radiant Circuitry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2XmdYW8OsAvjGDG3]{Radiant Circuitry}.

You emit bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).
Effect: Radiant Circuitry.name: Effect: Radiant Circuitry

Effect: Rage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Rage}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier.

You deal additional damage on melee Strikes. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.

When you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and can't gain temporary Hit Points from using the Rage action again for 1 minute.
Effect: Rage.name: Effect: Rage

Effect: Rage Temporary Hit Points Immuni.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Rage}

You can't gain temporary Hit Points from using the Rage action.
Effect: Rage Temporary Hit Points Immuni.name: Effect: Rage Temporary Hit Points Immunity

Effect: Raise Menhir.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BuVIM4cV7qhVZ2WF]{Raise Menhir}

Choose arcane, divine, or occult; all creatures within 15 feet of the monument gain a +2 status bonus to their saving throws against effects with that trait.
Effect: Raise Menhir.name: Effect: Raise Menhir

Effect: Raise Symbol.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.koER7gKf6CnW5O0s]{Raise Symbol}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws until the start of your next turn. While it's raised, if you roll a success at a saving throw against a vitality or void effect, you get a critical success instead.
Effect: Raise Symbol.name: Effect: Raise Symbol

Effect: Raise the Walls.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IBEbFlMmDbGsrN4G]{Raise the Walls}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and any save against force, spirit, vitality, or void effect.
Effect: Raise the Walls.name: Effect: Raise the Walls

Effect: Rallying Charge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.df4cBV3qZn3qNUmP]{Rallying Charge}

You gain temporary hit points equal to the Charisma modifier of the creature that used Rallying Charge.
Effect: Rallying Charge.name: Effect: Rallying Charge

Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.
Effect: Rampaging Form.name: Effect: Rampaging Form

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[cold]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)

Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks.
Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Effect: Read Shibboleths

Effect: Reanimator Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of summon undead.
Effect: Reanimator Dedication.name: Effect: Reanimator Dedication

Effect: Rebirth in Living Stone.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.mNiJvsbyxdLBnTRs]{Rebirth in Living Stone}

You gain 40 temporary Hit Points. You're immune to critical hits and precision damage. Your earth Elemental Blasts deal an additional 1d10 damage of their normal type.

Level (20th) You gain 50 temporary Hit Points.
Effect: Rebirth in Living Stone.name: Effect: Rebirth in Living Stone

Effect: Recall Under Pressure.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lH3mlvs1rCyXw6iY]{Recall Under Pressure}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws for the remainder of the combat encounter as your morale soars or a +2 status bonus if the card you drew was from the suit of Books.
Effect: Recall Under Pressure.name: Effect: Recall Under Pressure

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fqw1ELaqavuKLHIj]{Reckless Abandon}

If you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)

Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield}

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.
Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Effect: Reflexive Shield

Effect: Regional Specialty.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.l1I6bmdm31MPwmWU]{Regional Specialty}

You gain an item bonus against certain saves depending on the chosen element.

  • Wood Against disease and poison effects.
  • Fire Against being doomed or frightened.
  • Earth Against being enfeebled.
  • Metal Against being stupefied.
  • Water Against deafened or drained.
Effect: Regional Specialty.name: Effect: Regional Specialty

Effect: Renewed Vigor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3hhCDWPm021hvicR]{Renewed Vigor}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier. If you made an attack action this turn, increase the number of temporary Hit Points to your level plus your Constitution modifier.
Effect: Renewed Vigor.name: Effect: Renewed Vigor

Effect: Renewing Cycle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.frRJAuuAgDg3RFii]{Renewing Cycle}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.
Effect: Renewing Cycle.name: Effect: Renewing Cycle

Effect: Repair Module.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZGT7NLpcvREkJsMd]{Repair Module}

You gain fast healing equal to half your level.
Effect: Repair Module.name: Effect: Repair Module

Effect: Repel Ambient Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SN3sVsU7rD2eBfkf]{Repel Ambient Magic}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the next magical attack, cantrip, or spell that targets you. This bonus increases to +2 at 12th level.
Effect: Repel Ambient Magic.name: Effect: Repel Ambient Magic

Effect: Replenishment of War.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aMef2VM4mSxl0pmy]{Replenishment of War}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit.
Effect: Replenishment of War.name: Effect: Replenishment of War

Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level. On a Critical Success, you gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level.
Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Effect: Resounding Bravery

Effect: Resounding Finale.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lhSqWHXK1JShUabF]{Resounding Finale}

You gain sonic resistance against the triggering damage.
Effect: Resounding Finale.name: Effect: Resounding Finale

Effect: Restorative Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xUlRLkWnfZ7reej6]{Restorative Strike}

Cast a 1-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell to heal yourself, expending the spell normally. It loses the manipulate trait when cast this way. Then make a melee Strike. If you make this Strike with your deity's favored weapon, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll.

If the Strike hits, you can target a second willing creature to heal the same amount from the spell. This creature can be outside of the spell's range, provided it's adjacent to the enemy you hit.
Effect: Restorative Strike.name: Effect: Restorative Strike

Effect: Revitalizing Finisher.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.83zzG4XBiL5I3NZv]{Revitalizing Finisher}

You gain temporary Hit Points.
Effect: Revitalizing Finisher.name: Effect: Revitalizing Finisher

Effect: Roaring Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.F6TIEmYYJGmVhMXl]{Roaring Heart}

You gain temporary Hit Points.
Effect: Roaring Heart.name: Effect: Roaring Heart

Effect: Roll the Bones of Fate (Good).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7Q7HWETkvOM9pYwV]{Roll the Bones of Fate}

You can roll twice on your next attack roll or skill check, taking the higher result.
Effect: Roll the Bones of Fate (Good).name: Effect: Roll the Bones of Fate (Good)

Effect: Root Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.22P7IFyhrF7Fbw8B]{Root Magic}

You gain a circumstance bonus to a saving throw against a spell or haunt.
Effect: Root Magic.name: Effect: Root Magic

Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)

Effect: Safeguard Soul.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tBg3FZST3nX5TfLf]{Safeguard Soul}

You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul.
Effect: Safeguard Soul.name: Effect: Safeguard Soul

Effect: Sanctify Armament.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}

The weapon gains your holy or unholy trait. It also deals an additional 2d6 spirit damage to creatures of the opposed trait.
Effect: Sanctify Armament.name: Effect: Sanctify Armament

Effect: Saoc Astrology.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.csoGdGuWasEw3boD]{Saoc Astrology}

You gain the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.
Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: Effect: Saoc Astrology

Effect: Scout (Incredible Scout).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aFoVHsuInMOkTZoQ]{Incredible Scout}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.
Effect: Scout (Incredible Scout).name: Effect: Scout (Incredible Scout)

Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.
Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Effect: Scout's Warning

Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CAHJGt535l3Ai4cR]{Sea Glass Guardians}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws.
Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.name: Effect: Sea Glass Guardians

Effect: Seedpod.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWGa6cFSVrASTEfd]{Seedpod}

You take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to your Speed.
Effect: Seedpod.name: Effect: Seedpod

Effect: Selfish Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Shield}

You gain resistance against the triggering damage equal to 2 + half your level, regardless of damage type.
Effect: Selfish Shield.name: Effect: Selfish Shield

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.uoQOm41BVdSo6pAS]{Bloodline: Shadow}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Stealth or a -1 status penalty to Perception.
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic

Effect: Shadow Sheath Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ktgzHtKoeUZ5H8KA]{Shadow Sheath}

You load a weapon into the sheath.

Immanence Your Strikes with the weapon deal 2 additional spirit damage per weapon damage die, which increases to 3 per die if the target is off-guard.
Effect: Shadow Sheath Weapon.name: Effect: Shadow Sheath Weapon

Effect: Share Rage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vayNZR1bTzU1oUa3]{Share Rage}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. While you are raging, you deal 2 additional damage on melee Strikes. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
Effect: Share Rage.name: Effect: Share Rage

Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Shared Avoidance}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your saving throws against the hazard.
Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: Effect: Shared Avoidance

Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}

You can reroll the failed saving throw against the mental effect with a +2 circumstance bonus.
Effect: Shared Clarity.name: Effect: Shared Clarity

Effect: Shattershields.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QOnyOjncnw4tkTQp]{Shattershields}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Shattershields.name: Effect: Shattershields

Effect: Shed Tail.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.t3IzY8uSyFj3aGmh]{Shed Tail}

You take a -2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.
Effect: Shed Tail.name: Effect: Shed Tail

Effect: Sheltering Pulse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HP1DKj4FLwtStzYq]{Sheltering Pulse}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.
Effect: Sheltering Pulse.name: Effect: Sheltering Pulse

Effect: Shield Ally.description: The hardness of your equipped shield increases by 2.
Effect: Shield Ally.name: Effect: Shield Ally

Effect: Shield of Faith.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.w3qyriA1YnzXaas3]{Shield of Faith}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your AC.
Effect: Shield of Faith.name: Effect: Shield of Faith

Effect: Shield the Faithful.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VYwWqm5LZOU7irhY]{Shield the Faithful}

You gain a +1 item bonus to AC and resistance to spirit damage.
Effect: Shield the Faithful.name: Effect: Shield the Faithful

Effect: Shielding Wave.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.yOk8s1pftOe5I9Sg]{Shielding Wave}

You gain resistance to acid or fire damage.
Effect: Shielding Wave.name: Effect: Shielding Wave

Effect: Shining Arms.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iAziUKdxgy4k4ypY]{Shining Arms}

When a creature wielding the weapon critically hits a foe, you can Dismiss the spell as a reaction, causing the foe to be dazzled for 1 round
Effect: Shining Arms.name: Effect: Shining Arms

Effect: Shining Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tKC06HYkt1XaWk78]{Shining Glory}

You gain a +3 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks, and the status bonus you receive to saving throws against fear increases to +3.
Effect: Shining Glory.name: Effect: Shining Glory

Effect: Show Off.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DMjfZvWD20SGuIO4]{Show-Off}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level (double your level on a critical success).
Effect: Show Off.name: Effect: Show Off

Effect: Signature Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yiZwGVErxzWCJOlW]{Signature Weapon}

You gain access to its critical specialization effect of the selected weapon.
Effect: Signature Weapon.name: Effect: Signature Weapon

Effect: Silk Bracelet.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bI0PWJ4c3AOcFDWN]{Silk Bracelet}

You gain a -10 foot status penalty to all your Speeds for 1 round.
Effect: Silk Bracelet.name: Effect: Silk Bracelet

Effect: Siphon Torment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XdicxD5jMJ8JSVqk]{Siphon Torment}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's level.
Effect: Siphon Torment.name: Effect: Siphon Torment

Effect: Sixth Pillar Mastery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sFAqKrzqXQhtrfqN]{Sixth Pillar Mastery}

You have a -1 status penalty to saves against spells from the source, or you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed Strikes.
Effect: Sixth Pillar Mastery.name: Effect: Sixth Pillar Mastery

Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide vital advice to sharpen your newer colleagues' skills. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to skill checks to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's skill check modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS)

Effect: Smite.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite}.

Designate one enemy you can see. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that enemy gain a +3 status bonus to damage, increasing to +4 if you have master proficiency with the weapon or unarmed attack you're using for the Strike. If you're holy or unholy and the target has the opposite trait, the bonus is +4 (or +6 if you're a master).
Effect: Smite.name: Effect: Smite

Effect: Smite Good.description:
Granted by Smite Good.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 spirit damage if the target is holy, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.
Effect: Smite Good.name: Effect: Smite Good

Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication}.

Whenever you or your spotter successfully Strikes a target, the other member of your duo gains a +1 circumstance bonus per weapon damage die on the damage roll of their next Strike made against that target before the end of their next turn.
Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.name: Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication

Effect: Soaring Flight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tl8yckXeTCHnwrlM]{Soaring Flight}

You gain a fly Speed of 20 feet for this movement.
Effect: Soaring Flight.name: Effect: Soaring Flight

Effect: Soothing Vials.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BAsKBwlbJAQ6sLhN]{Soothing Vials}

The creature gains a +1 item bonus to the new Will saving throw.
Effect: Soothing Vials.name: Effect: Soothing Vials

Effect: Soul Vessel Mount.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.drcZf55HVsTnnTcF]{Soul Vessel Mount}

You gain a +20-foot status bonus to your Speed.
Effect: Soul Vessel Mount.name: Effect: Soul Vessel Mount

Effect: Spark Fist.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BL2nLeClO30QoQGs]{Spark Fist}

Your fist loses the nonlethal trait and deals additional fire damage on a successful Strike.
Effect: Spark Fist.name: Effect: Spark Fist

Effect: Spell Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.X9AkydrMdFwg7qIn]{Spell Parry}

You raise your guard, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and to saving throws against spells that target you.
Effect: Spell Parry.name: Effect: Spell Parry

Effect: Spell Protection Array.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3CPKbiweBRzXAJA9]{Spell Protection Array}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magic.
Effect: Spell Protection Array.name: Effect: Spell Protection Array

Effect: Spin Tale.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against the villain until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Spin Tale.name: Effect: Spin Tale

Effect: Spiral Sworn.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ef57tIj30IaPnSgC]{Spiral Sworn}

Your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the rank of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.
Effect: Spiral Sworn.name: Effect: Spiral Sworn

Effect: Spirit Guide Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WKRSBu7H9miAwUaR]{Spirit Guide Form}

You fuse with your spirit guide, becoming a hybrid being with enhanced physical and spiritual power. This effect lasts 1 minute; you can end it early as a free action. During this time, you can't use any other actions granted by this archetype. You gain the following statistics and abilities, regardless of your type of spirit guide.

  • You become incorporeal.
  • You gain resistance 10 to all damage (except force, ghost touch, or vitality; double resistance vs. non-magical).
  • Darkvision.
  • An unarmed melee attack of the same type as your spirit guide (either claws or jaws), which is the only attack you can Strike with. You're trained with this attack. Your attack modifier is +29 or your normal unarmed attack modifier, whichever is higher. You use the listed statistics for the unarmed attack type:
    • Claws (agile, backstabber, finesse) 1, Damage 3d6+5 slashing plus 1d6 force;
    • Jaws (forceful) 1, Damage 3d10+5 piercing plus 1d6 force.
Effect: Spirit Guide Form.name: Effect: Spirit Guide Form

Effect: Spirit's Mercy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SPtzUNatWJvTK61y]{Spirit's Mercy}

You gain resistance to vitality and void damage (or resistance to all damage if caused by a haunt or incorporeal undead) against the triggering effect. If you expend a spirit wisp, the resistance is equal to twice your level. If you expend a spirit remnant, the resistance is equal to three times the level of the incorporeal undead or haunt from which you gained the remnant.
Effect: Spirit's Mercy.name: Effect: Spirit's Mercy

Effect: Staggering Fire.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fngPLUD4Sltho2kn]{Staggering Fire}

You take a -5-foot circumstance penalty to your Speed, or a -10-foot circumstance penalty on a critical hit.
Effect: Staggering Fire.name: Effect: Staggering Fire

Effect: Starlight Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jK0hjx4qsRyKnpBd]{Starlight Armor}

You gain resistance 7 to piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage. You also shed bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

When you reach 17th level, the resistance increases to 10.
Effect: Starlight Armor.name: Effect: Starlight Armor

Effect: Starlit Transformation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M4ALaFXoQDJGxSsI]{Starlit Transformation}

Your weapon gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls. You can fling bolts of starlight from your weapon with a Strike action, using your melee attack modifier with the weapon. These bolts deal 1d4 force damage and have the arcane and force traits.
Effect: Starlit Transformation.name: Effect: Starlit Transformation

Effect: Steal Death.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Kb28vpCQNvA6wS1O]{Steal Death}

You gain fast healing as long as you and your apocalypse mount are within 10 feet of each other. If you use Steal Death again, your fast healing increases by 1.
Effect: Steal Death.name: Effect: Steal Death

Effect: Steel Yourself!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4Y7wKFogGB0LZ5ZA]{Steel Yourself!}

You gain temporary Hit Points and a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.
Effect: Steel Yourself!.name: Effect: Steel Yourself!

Effect: Stone Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgg9eNF6MsJPMjyH]{Stone Body}

You gain resistance 10 to all damage.
Effect: Stone Body.name: Effect: Stone Body

Effect: Stoney Deflection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CSa7v4MtbiA3FI0c]{Stoney Deflection}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped
Effect: Stoney Deflection.name: Effect: Stoney Deflection

Effect: Storied Companion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tQvWDkatsuYsNkds]{Storied Companion}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice the origin's level.
Effect: Storied Companion.name: Effect: Storied Companion

Effect: Strain Mind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.u8YnTCS2EGoJl90W]{Strain Mind}

You add an amp that costs 1 Focus Point to the spell. Instead of paying the normal Focus Point cost, you lose Hit Points equal to four times the spell rank of the amped psi cantrip as you bleed from your nose or suffer some other visible sign of strain.
Effect: Strain Mind.name: Effect: Strain Mind

Effect: Strained Metabolism.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.huDGjojm3hnuA1E8]{Strained Metabolism}
