Mild Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until you take a bite of food (which usually requires 2 Interact actions: one to retrieve the food and another to consume it).

Moderate Backlash You are enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} until you can eat a full meal, which requires at least 10 minutes.

Severe Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} as nausea wracks you, and you are also enfeebled 1 and clumsy 1 until you can eat a full meal (which requires you to no longer be sickened). You are fatigued until you can get a full night's rest.
Effect: Strained Metabolism.name: Effect: Strained Metabolism

Effect: Strategist Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fJwsZM6WXwP8EStV]{Strategist Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to Reflex saving throws
Effect: Strategist Stance.name: Effect: Strategist Stance

Effect: Striking Retribution.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TGlb3gmSKkJBZt5q]{Striking Retribution}

Your circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against creatures from the alghollthu family and those that serve alghollthus increases to +4
Effect: Striking Retribution.name: Effect: Striking Retribution

Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qV6EuOI3UJYIL6xa]{Consolidated Overlay Panopticon}

You gain darkvision and low-light vision, and you gain a +1 status bonus to visual Perception checks.
Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.name: Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes

Effect: Surgical Shock (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zzjfENthtRBAjqjQ]{Surgical Shock}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the next attack action you attempt against the target.
Effect: Surgical Shock (Failure).name: Effect: Surgical Shock (Failure)

Effect: Survive the Wilds.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.NdMSHDtV9G7MbdP2]{Survive the Wilds}

You and all allies in a 15-foot emanation gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against effects with the trait the pelt is attuned to.
Effect: Survive the Wilds.name: Effect: Survive the Wilds

Effect: Sword Practice.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AmFv3ClkAVRowHLI]{Tengu Weapon Familiarity}

During your daily preparations, you can practice with a weapon from the sword group that's in your possession. You gain familiarity with that weapon as well. This lasts until you practice with a different sword in the same way.
Effect: Sword Practice.name: Effect: Sword Practice

Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Xdmz09kzLjIxWz9C]{Tactical Debilitations}

The target can't flank or contribute to allies' flanking.
Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.name: Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flanking)

Effect: Tail Toxin.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ev8OHpBO3xq3Zt08]{Tail Toxin}

You apply your tail's venom to a piercing or slashing weapon. If your next Strike with that weapon before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, you deal persistent poison damage equal to your level to the target.
Effect: Tail Toxin.name: Effect: Tail Toxin

Effect: Tap the Past.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.jsEBrm8SPcsokJLw]{Tap the Past}

You roll a second time and use the higher result. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
Effect: Tap the Past.name: Effect: Tap the Past

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed.
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic)

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

Enemies take a -5-foot status penalty to their Speeds (-10-foot on a critical failure).
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic)

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to the spell rank.
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain)

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell rank.
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains)

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain darkvision as well as imprecise tremorsense out to 15 feet.
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground)

Effect: Terrain Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TNRB8IY6Wtk9BoMp]{Terrain Shield}

You gain resistance to physical damage equal to double your level against the triggering Strike.
Effect: Terrain Shield.name: Effect: Terrain Shield

Effect: The Bigger They Are.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.azF1RvMTwCPaJr1F]{The Bigger They Are}

You gain weakness to the origin's precision damage.
Effect: The Bigger They Are.name: Effect: The Bigger They Are

Effect: The Proud.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.GF9uIGA947DiC2dR]{The Proud}

You take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than the exemplar, and a +1 status bonus to these rolls when targeting the exemplar.
Effect: The Proud.name: Effect: The Proud

Effect: Thermal Nimbus.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XJCsa3UbQtsKcqve]{Thermal Nimbus}

You gain cold or fire resistance.
Effect: Thermal Nimbus.name: Effect: Thermal Nimbus

Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pqVG9mRKcXg5Rsjc]{Thoughtform Summoning}

You gain resistance to physical damage equal to half its level and weakness 5 to force and mental damage.
Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.name: Effect: Thoughtform Summoning

Effect: Tidal Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bPPcPUZMlJ7m5lYq]{Tidal Shield}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC.
Effect: Tidal Shield.name: Effect: Tidal Shield

Effect: Tiller's Drive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.
Effect: Tiller's Drive.name: Effect: Tiller's Drive

Effect: To War!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1fH3M3XaUWWOJZFM]{To War!}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's level and a +2 status bonus to damage against any foe damaged by the origin's apocalypse mount.
Effect: To War!.name: Effect: To War!

Effect: Topple Giants.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RHEdvEFz3QKiRKlr]{Topple Giants}

When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.
Effect: Topple Giants.name: Effect: Topple Giants

Effect: Towering Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.t3Eky3ijnAJTiCV5]{Towering Presence}

You increase your size your size to Large. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage.
Effect: Towering Presence.name: Effect: Towering Presence

Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Treat Wounds for the duration.
Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.name: Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity

Effect: Turn Aside Ambient Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5g0gCXJnUVipYtW0]{Turn Aside Ambient Magic}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. You gain resistance against the chosen damage type equal to half your level.
Effect: Turn Aside Ambient Magic.name: Effect: Turn Aside Ambient Magic

Effect: Turn Back The Clock.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3aG0gkHulBIHqqGE]{Turn Back the Clock}

You reroll the triggering check with a +1 circumstance bonus.
Effect: Turn Back The Clock.name: Effect: Turn Back The Clock

Effect: Twin Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if neither weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Twin Parry.name: Effect: Twin Parry

Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if either weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).name: Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait)

Effect: Uncanny Bombs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Ht1eyBHsB1swpeE]{Uncanny Bombs}

You reduce any circumstance bonus to the target's AC from cover by 1.
Effect: Uncanny Bombs.name: Effect: Uncanny Bombs

Effect: Undead Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.7WBZ2kkhZ7JorWu2]{Bloodline: Undead}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank for 1 round.
Effect: Undead Blood Magic.name: Effect: Undead Blood Magic

Effect: Undying Conviction.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{Undying Conviction}

Undead creatures gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws to resist vitality damage and to Will saving throws to resist effects that would make them controlled.
Effect: Undying Conviction.name: Effect: Undying Conviction

Effect: Undying Ferocity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZOycr00XDVTKuXa]{Undying Ferocity}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.
Effect: Undying Ferocity.name: Effect: Undying Ferocity

Effect: Unending Subsistence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RR0p9E6GWt0CRA1q]{Unending Subsistence}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saving throws.
Effect: Unending Subsistence.name: Effect: Unending Subsistence

Effect: Unfazed Assessment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZyQYP7i26DWhMNux]{Unfazed Assessment}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the target creature's attacks (or a +2 circumstance bonus for a critical success).
Effect: Unfazed Assessment.name: Effect: Unfazed Assessment

Effect: Unleash Psyche.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7GeguyqyD1TjoC4r]{Unleash Psyche}

When you cast a damaging spell, you gain a status bonus to its damage equal to double the spell's rank. This applies only to spells that don't have a duration and that you cast using psychic spellcasting.
Effect: Unleash Psyche.name: Effect: Unleash Psyche

Effect: Unleash Yaoguai Might.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fjB514XFJG4V3wMy]{Unleash Yaoguai Might}

Frequency once per day

As you enter your yaoguai form, you draw upon your internal magic to assume an even greater form. When you Change Shape to enter your yaoguai form, you can spend an additional action to gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} and an additional effect based on your heritage. This effect persists for 1 minute or until you Change Shape again.

  • Animal Your hide thickens, granting a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
  • Celestial You recover some of your celestial perfection, granting you and all allies within 15 feet a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.
  • Elements You're surrounded in wind and dust, granting concealment each round that you spend at least 1 action that has the move trait. You can't use this concealment to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, as normal for sources of obvious concealment.
  • Object Your skin transmutes partially into an inorganic substance, granting resistance 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing.
  • Vegetation You trigger an accelerated growth, gaining fast healing 5.
Effect: Unleash Yaoguai Might.name: Effect: Unleash Yaoguai Might

Effect: Unstable Check Failure.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.jIAgXe2FetAKBwt7]{Innovation} failing an Unstable check

The innovation malfunctions in a spectacular (though harmless) fashion, such as a belch of smoke or shower of sparks, and it becomes incapable of being used for further unstable actions.
Effect: Unstable Check Failure.name: Effect: Unstable Check Failure

Effect: Unwavering Resilience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KofrLYBif2QKyiqe]{Unwavering Resilience}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Point equal to your level.
Effect: Unwavering Resilience.name: Effect: Unwavering Resilience

Effect: Upstage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.F0JgJR2rXKOg9k1z]{Upstage}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of your next turn.
Effect: Upstage.name: Effect: Upstage

Effect: Ursine Avenger Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zV4vzcl7eoVewz5p]{Ursine Avenger Form}

You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage and a claws unarmed attack that deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the agile trait.
Effect: Ursine Avenger Form.name: Effect: Ursine Avenger Form

Effect: Vicious Debilitations.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zt5CWn3UrPViwaB3]{Vicious Debilitations}

You gain weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.
Effect: Vicious Debilitations.name: Effect: Vicious Debilitations

Effect: Victor's Wreath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.pHUi7KCh1DH5pxMe]{Victor's Wreath}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.
Effect: Victor's Wreath.name: Effect: Victor's Wreath

Effect: Victorious Vigor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YeVDITJplindA27l]{Victorious Vigor}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.
Effect: Victorious Vigor.name: Effect: Victorious Vigor

Effect: Vigorous Anthem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4SKech3n0F38HrR5]{Vigorous Anthem}

You gain temporary HP equal to 3 + the source's Charisma modifier.
Effect: Vigorous Anthem.name: Effect: Vigorous Anthem

Effect: Vindication Edge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.QOOwC3S41CKGkxlN]{Vindicator}

You take a –1 status penalty to their saving throws against divine spells.
Effect: Vindication Edge.name: Effect: Vindication Edge

Effect: Virulent Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fns6SMiYrUeL6cnx]{Virulent Strike}

You take a –4 circumstance penalty to the save against a disease or poison.
Effect: Virulent Strike.name: Effect: Virulent Strike

Effect: Vivacious Bravado.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2MHzEh1KUQEbhjUf]{Vivacious Bravado}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Charisma modifier.
Effect: Vivacious Bravado.name: Effect: Vivacious Bravado

Effect: Volatile Grease (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vKFg7HMNu4cCDD8b]{Volatile Grease}

The target gains weakness 2 to fire for 1 minute.

Heightened (+2) The weakness increases by 1.
Effect: Volatile Grease (Failure).name: Effect: Volatile Grease (Failure)

Effect: Volatile Grease (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vKFg7HMNu4cCDD8b]{Volatile Grease}

The target gains weakness 2 to fire until the end of your next turn.

Heightened (+2) The weakness increases by 1.
Effect: Volatile Grease (Success).name: Effect: Volatile Grease (Success)

Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.GpT5RXUwhINODqkJ]{(Affinity Ablaze) Arms of Balance: Walking the Cardinal Paths}

One of your weapons or your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 2d6 fire, cold, acid, or electricity damage. The Strikes gain the appropriate energy trait as well.
Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.name: Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths

Effect: Watch Your Back.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZCyJhsaugHB6mZW]{Watch Your Back}

The target gains a +2 status bonus to Perception checks against you, but it takes a –2 status penalty to Will saves against fear effects.
Effect: Watch Your Back.name: Effect: Watch Your Back

Effect: Watchful Gaze.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KKUDZUbX3nDdME4K]{Watchful Gaze}

You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{All-Around Vision} until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.
Effect: Watchful Gaze.name: Effect: Watchful Gaze

Effect: Weapon Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gvx8Mdg5mxUtTD5g]{Weapon Infusion}.

If your next action is an Elemental Blast, choose a weapon shape for it to take. You can choose to change the blast's damage type to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing-whichever suits the weapon shape-and you can choose other alterations depending on whether you make a melee or ranged blast.

  • Melee Add one of the following traits of your choice: agile, backswing, forceful, reach, sweep.
  • Ranged Choose one of three options: range increment 100 feet and the volley 30 feet trait, range increment 50 feet and the propulsive trait, or range increment 20 feet and the thrown trait.
Effect: Weapon Infusion.name: Effect: Weapon Infusion

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical Success)

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success)

Effect: Web.description: The target takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.
Effect: Web.name: Effect: Web

Effect: Whispers of Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.55WR55op9BIdgF1B]{Whispers of Weakness}

You target one creature. You gain a +2 status bonus to your next attack roll (or skill check made as part of an attack action) against that foe.
Effect: Whispers of Weakness.name: Effect: Whispers of Weakness

Effect: Wild Mimic Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U9mK9TXbGriGeMOW]{Wild Mimic Dedication}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your saving throws against the next attack or ability that the subject of your Recall Knowledge targets you with.
Effect: Wild Mimic Dedication.name: Effect: Wild Mimic Dedication

Effect: Wings of Air.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.FUOUyhHufNH4ri7H]{Wings of Air}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
Effect: Wings of Air.name: Effect: Wings of Air

Effect: Wish for Luck.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.N6U02s9qJKQIvmQd]{Wish for Luck}

Roll the attack roll, saving throw, or skill check twice and take the higher result.
Effect: Wish for Luck.name: Effect: Wish for Luck

Effect: Witch's Charge.description: Granted when you designate someone as your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.52QyoGaysrfBOy5H]{Witch's Charge}.
Effect: Witch's Charge.name: Effect: Witch's Charge

Effect: Wither Away.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hmpkzEQV6kTFxPan]{Wither Away}

You take the following penalties depending on the result

  • Arms You become enfeebled 1.
  • Head You become stupefied 1.
  • Legs You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.
  • Torso You gain weakness 10 to slashing damage.
Effect: Wither Away.name: Effect: Wither Away

Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.description: You gain temporary hit points equal to your level.
Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.name: Effect: Wood Impulse Junction

Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you help your less experienced colleagues recognize danger and withstand danger. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to Perception checks and Initiative rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Perception modifier by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.
Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS)

Effect: Worm Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jynhIXH1zEavQA7v]{Worm Form}

You take on the form of a purple worm or transform into a humanoid-worm hybrid, retaining your own head but with a worm's body, transforming into a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the ability is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the form.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Purple Worm Speed 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, swim 20 feet
    • Melee 1 jaws (deadly 2d10, reach 15 feet), Damage 3d10+15 piercing
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, poison, reach 15 feet), Damage 2d12+15 piercing plus 2d6 persistent poison
    • Melee 1 body (reach 15 feet) Damage 1d10+13 bludgeoning
  • Hybrid Speed 40 feet
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, poison, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d12+15 piercing plus 1d6 persistent poison
    • Melee 1 body (reach 10 feet), Damage 1d10+13 bludgeoning
    • Hybrid Caster You retain the ability to speak, and can cast spells as long as they don't have somatic or material components.
Effect: Worm Form.name: Effect: Worm Form

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.dKTb959aCQIzSIXj]{Bloodline: Wyrmblessed}

Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round, or a target takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic.name: Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic

Effect: You're an Embarrassment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.13bMIkqXpKt9pxAm]{You're an Embarrassment!}

You reroll the triggering Will saving throw with a +1 circumstance bonus.
Effect: You're an Embarrassment.name: Effect: You're an Embarrassment

Effect: Zealous Inevitability.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.eaw645inkbHNylgC]{Zealous Inevitability}

You take a status penalty to your saving throws against divine spells equal to your doomed value.
Effect: Zealous Inevitability.name: Effect: Zealous Inevitability

Stance: Air Shroud.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QV4NCyZQBCABykS1]{Air Shroud}

Attacks with ranged weapons take a -1 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls if their paths pass through your kinetic aura. Air in your kinetic aura is difficult terrain for flying creatures other than yourself.
Stance: Air Shroud.name: Stance: Air Shroud

Stance: Arcane Cascade.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HbejhIywqIufrmVM]{Arcane Cascade}

Your melee Strikes deal 1 extra force damage. This damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization and 3 if you have greater weapon specialization. Any Strike that benefits from this damage gains the arcane trait, making it magical.

If your most recent spell before entering the stance was one that can deal damage, the damage from the stance is instead the same type that spell could deal (or one type of your choice if the spell could deal multiple types of damage).
Stance: Arcane Cascade.name: Stance: Arcane Cascade

Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vV0nW9OIJ0VdeVjy]{Assume Earth's Mantle}

  • You become Large if you were smaller. This increases your reach by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny).
  • You gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed, but you can use it only to climb surfaces of earthen matter.
  • The armor grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude saves and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DCs against attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} you, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} you, or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
  • If your Strength is below +4, this armor raises your Strength to +4. If your Strength is +4 or higher, this armor grants you a +1 item bonus to your Strength.
  • If you have the Armor in Earth impulse, you can add its effects to Assume Earth's Mantle.
Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle.name: Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle

Stance: Buckler Dance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tDWc2LQNl0Op1Auq]{Buckler Dance}

You constantly have your buckler raised as if you'd used Raise a Shield.
Stance: Buckler Dance.name: Stance: Buckler Dance

Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance}

While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using bayonets, reinforced stocks, and simple firearms. You can use Flurry of Blows with these weapons. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with bayonets and reinforced stocks, so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike. You can also use them with simple firearms when attacking within half the first range increment.
Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.name: Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance

Stance: Claw Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.zs4ZMcH9oFSCgkBx]{Claw Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are frenzied claw unarmed attacks. These deal 1d6 slashing damage, are in the brawling group, and have the agile, finesse, grapple, unarmed, and versatile piercing traits.
Stance: Claw Stance.name: Stance: Claw Stance

Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uJXs4M6IeixfPBLc]{Clinging Shadows Stance}

You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1d4 void damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in the clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Grapple, and to the DC for creatures to Escape from you.
Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.name: Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance

Stance: Cobra Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 piercing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, unarmed, and venomous traits.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.
Stance: Cobra Stance.name: Stance: Cobra Stance

Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{Cobra Envenom}, which increases the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC to +2.

The only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.
Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).name: Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)

Stance: Crane Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bf7NCeKqDClaqhTR]{Crane Stance}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC, but the only Strikes you can make are crane wing attacks. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

Reduce the DC for High Jump and Long Jump by 5, and when you Leap, you can move an additional 5 feet horizontally or 2 feet vertically.
Stance: Crane Stance.name: Stance: Crane Stance

Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8iHpUB0bYaHh86Kk]{Crowned in Tempest's Fury}

  • Any creature that enters your kinetic aura or ends its turn there takes 2d12 electricity damage.
  • If you don't have a fly Speed, you gain a 20-foot fly Speed. If you have the Cyclonic Ascent impulse, you instead gain that fly Speed and the extra benefits.
  • You gain a +10-foot status bonus to all your Speeds.
  • Your air Elemental Blasts deal an additional 1d12 electricity damage.
Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury.name: Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury

Stance: Desert Wind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ti6rPcSBsCuyEHqy]{Desert Wind}

Each creature inside your kinetic aura (including you) is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from any creature outside your kinetic aura, and creatures outside the aura are concealed from creatures inside the aura other than you. Your air impulses carry sands that cut at great speed.

When you use a damaging air impulse that affects at least one creature in your kinetic aura, that impulse deals 1 additional slashing damage, or 2 if the impulse has a single target.

Level (+2) The extra damage increases by 1, or 2 if the impulse has a single target.
Stance: Desert Wind.name: Stance: Desert Wind

Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OqqytsF2RIjB0EPR]{Devrin's Cunning Stance}

Your aura grants you and your allies a +1 status bonus to skill checks. When you or an ally in the aura Strike an off-guard enemy, that enemy can't use reactions until the beginning of its next turn.
Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance.name: Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance

Stance: Disarming Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1p5ErCp33nGOzEsk]{Disarming Stance}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you.
Stance: Disarming Stance.name: Stance: Disarming Stance

Stance: Disruptive Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OEGhbRgW6wRbccns]{Disruptive Stance}

You can use Reactive Strike when a creature within your reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to manipulate and move actions.

Furthermore, you disrupt a triggering concentrate or manipulate action if your Strike hits (not only if it's a critical hit).
Stance: Disruptive Stance.name: Stance: Disruptive Stance

Stance: Divine Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2uYigDgvlfCZVg9e]{Divine Presence}

You have a 5-foot emanation that has the aura trait. You can Sustain the emanation to increase its radius by 5 feet, up to a maximum of 15 feet.

An enemy that ends its turn completely within the emanation is Off-Guard to your Strikes.
Stance: Divine Presence.name: Stance: Divine Presence

Stance: Dragon Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8sy3sHwOHS4ImwvJ]{Dragon Stance}

You can make dragon tail attacks that deal 1d10 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the backswing, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

You can ignore the first square of difficult terrain while Striding.
Stance: Dragon Stance.name: Stance: Dragon Stance

Stance: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}.

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon the you are wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.
Stance: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Stance: Dread Marshal Stance

Stance: Drifting Pollen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7W5oubPLcxHJdcHX]{Drifting Pollen}

A creature in your kinetic aura when you enter the stance, or who later enters the aura or ends its turn in the aura, attempts at a Fortitude save against your class DC. On a failure, it's sickened 1 (sickened 2 on a critical failure) and dazzled until it's no longer sickened. A creature attempts this save no more than once per round and doesn't attempt a new save if already affected.
Stance: Drifting Pollen.name: Stance: Drifting Pollen

Stance: Dueling Dance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9VGmE7X4aK2W8YWj]{Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.FYz5eQeTox9IDkSd]{Dueling Dance (Fighter)}

You constantly have the benefits of Dueling Parry or Extravagant Parry.
Stance: Dueling Dance.name: Stance: Dueling Dance

Stance: Everstand Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6GN1zh3RcnZhrzxP]{Everstand Stance}

You wield the shield with both hands. When wielding a shield this way, increase the weapon damage die of the shield's boss or spikes by one step, and increase the shield's Hardness by 2 when using the Shield Block reaction.
Stance: Everstand Stance.name: Stance: Everstand Stance

Stance: Fane's Fourberie.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.80CEAB05TP5ki9iW]{Fane's Fourberie}

Choose whether to treat playing cards in your possession as daggers or darts; you can wield a playing card in all ways as the chosen weapon until the stance ends.
Stance: Fane's Fourberie.name: Stance: Fane's Fourberie

Stance: Geologic Attunement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YRanyv890fLiyaOY]{Geologic Attunement}

You gain tremorsense (imprecise) in your kinetic aura.

At 13th level this becomes precise tremorsense.
Stance: Geologic Attunement.name: Stance: Geologic Attunement

Stance: Ghosts in the Storm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ABL4daQ7c65d0tEM]{Ghosts in the Storm}

You and your allies while they're in your kinetic aura gain a +2 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks. When an affected creature uses a move action, clouds dance around it. Until the start of its next turn, it's concealed, and its Strikes gain the shock rune.
Stance: Ghosts in the Storm.name: Stance: Ghosts in the Storm

Stance: Gorilla Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Climb, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.
Stance: Gorilla Stance.name: Stance: Gorilla Stance

Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nRjyyDulHnP5OewA]{Gorilla Pound}, which grants you a climb speed of 15 while you are in this stance.

The only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Climb, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.
Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).name: Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound)

Stance: Graceful Poise.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rFaUJtB46scuAidY]{Graceful Poise}

When you make your second Strike from Double Slice with an agile weapon, Double Slice counts as one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty.
Stance: Graceful Poise.name: Stance: Graceful Poise

Stance: Impassable Wall Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YeyOqNFKaeuOTiJr]{Impassable Wall Stance}

When you critically hit with a Reactive Strike triggered by a move action, you disrupt that move action.
Stance: Impassable Wall Stance.name: Stance: Impassable Wall Stance

Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}.

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.
Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance

Stance: Intensified Element Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qOGD3K8VlQAAjsWy]{Intensified Element Stance}

Your Strikes and damaging spells deal an additional 1d6 damage against certain creatures, depending on the type of elemental medicine expended. If the person who crafted the elemental medicine expended was legendary in the skill they used, increased this damage to 2d6.

  • Earth acid damage against water creatures

  • Fire fire damage against metal creatures and constructs that are primarily metallic

  • Metal electricity damage against wood or plant creatures and constructs primarily made of wood or plant matter

  • Water sonic damage against fire creatures

  • Wood cold damage against earth creatures and constructs that are primarily made of rock or earth
Stance: Intensified Element Stance.name: Stance: Intensified Element Stance

Stance: Ironblood Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.x9cYkB8DrUBBwqJd]{Ironblood Stance}

You can make iron sweep unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, parry, sweep, and unarmed traits.

While in Ironblood Stance, you gain resistance 2 to all damage. The resistance increases to 3 at 12th level, to 4 at 16th level, and to 5 at 20th level.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.fRlvmul3LbLo2xvR]{Effect: Parry}
Stance: Ironblood Stance.name: Stance: Ironblood Stance

Stance: Jellyfish Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Jwq5o13uZF3ooln1]{Jellyfish Stance}

You can make stinging lash attacks that deal 1d6 slashing damage. These attacks are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, nonlethal, reach, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves and on checks to Escape and Squeeze.
Stance: Jellyfish Stance.name: Stance: Jellyfish Stance

Stance: Kaiju Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RwOGkOLCalt4sqz6]{Kaiju Stance}

You become Large and are clumsy 1. The only Strikes you can make are shattering earth attacks. These strikes deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage, are in the brawling group, and have the backswing, fatal d12, reach, and unarmed traits. On a critical success with a shattering earth attack, all creatures other than you that are within 10 feet of the target, including the target itself, take 1 point of bludgeoning splash damage per weapon damage die.

You ignore difficult terrain.
Stance: Kaiju Stance.name: Stance: Kaiju Stance

Stance: Kindle Inner Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ySeT8hrMEPF9AsQu]{Kindle Inner Flames}

You shed faint, glowing embers, as do your allies while they're in your kinetic aura. Anyone shedding these embers gains a +1 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks and can Step as a free action once per round. When an affected creature takes a move action, its Strikes deal an extra @Damage[2[fire]] damage until the end of its turn.

Level (12th) The status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks is +2, and the Strikes gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming} rune instead of the extra 2 fire damage.
Stance: Kindle Inner Flames.name: Stance: Kindle Inner Flames

Stance: Lunging Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZghzLmYgeE19GqjP]{Lunging Stance}

You can use Reactive Strike against a creature that is outside your reach but within the reach you would have with a Lunge. If you do, you increase your range with the Strike by 5 feet.
Stance: Lunging Stance.name: Stance: Lunging Stance

Stance: Magnetic Field.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YJCAiNpFbX2MIc0G]{Magnetic Field}

Choose a polarity when you take this action. You can switch the polarity as a free action at the start of each of your turns while you remain in this stance.

Attract A creature that is wearing metal armor, has the metal trait, or is made of metal treats squares in your kinetic aura as difficult terrain when moving away from you. You pull unattended metal objects of light Bulk or less in your kinetic aura to you. They gather in your space and move with you.

Repel A creature that is wearing metal armor, has the metal trait, or is made of metal treats squares in your kinetic aura as difficult terrain when moving closer to you. You push unattended metal objects of light Bulk or less in your kinetic aura away. They stop moving once they're outside your aura.
Stance: Magnetic Field.name: Stance: Magnetic Field

Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KMVXUgFArcftg1jQ]{Masquerade of Seasons Stance}

Choose one of the following traits: water, fire, void, or cold. You gain resistance to damage dealt by effects with the chosen trait.
Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance.name: Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance

Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rByA8NDI6ZtNgBeT]{Mobile Shot Stance}

Your ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions that are triggered by a ranged attack.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike}, you can use it with a loaded ranged weapon you're wielding. The triggering creature must be within 5 feet of you for you to do so.
Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.name: Stance: Mobile Shot Stance

Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are those using longbows, shortbows, or bows with the monk trait.

You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows} with these bows. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with these bows when attacking within half the first range increment (normally 50 feet for a longbow and 30 feet for a shortbow), so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike.
Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.name: Stance: Monastic Archer Stance

Stance: Mountain Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are falling stone unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the forceful, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +4 item bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped. However, you have a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +0, meaning you don't add your Dexterity to your AC, and your Speeds are all reduced by 5 feet. The item bonus to AC from Mountain Stance is cumulative with armor potency runes on your explorer's clothing, mage armor, and bracers of armor.
Stance: Mountain Stance.name: Stance: Mountain Stance

Stance: Multishot Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RzhnxgiAopWILCvs]{Multishot Stance}.

While you are in this stance, your penalty for Double Shot is reduced to -1, or -2 if you add the extra action to make three Strikes. If you move from your position, this stance ends.
Stance: Multishot Stance.name: Stance: Multishot Stance

Stance: Orchard's Endurance.description:
You and your allies in your kinetic aura gain resistance 5 to bludgeoning and piercing damage. In addition, you and your affected allies roll flat checks to recover from persistent damage twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.

Level (+4) The resistance increases by 2.
Stance: Orchard's Endurance.name: Stance: Orchard's Endurance

Stance: Paragon's Guard.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hPDerDCYmag3s0dP]{Paragon's Guard}.

You constantly have your shield raised as if you'd used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action, as long as you meet that action's requirements.
Stance: Paragon's Guard.name: Stance: Paragon's Guard

Stance: Peafowl Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.C3MgEkPNaIhTddbr]{Peafowl Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are melee Strikes with the required sword. Once per round, after you hit with a monk sword Strike, you can Step as a free action as your next action.
Stance: Peafowl Stance.name: Stance: Peafowl Stance

Stance: Point Blank Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Yl2wYv24v5kw95aS]{Point Blank Stance}

When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.
Stance: Point Blank Stance.name: Stance: Point Blank Stance

Stance: Powder Punch Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Ziky4XVV7syXVbUg]{Powder Punch Stance}

On your first melee Strike each round with an unarmed attack, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.dgXjUcaoQDAY6ZpO]{Knuckle Duster}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8eGV6fXbmt2v74uB]{Black Powder Knuckle Dusters}, you deal an additional 1 fire Damage. If you critically succeed at an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} while in this stance, the target is pushed back an additional 5 feet.
Stance: Powder Punch Stance.name: Stance: Powder Punch Stance

Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are fire talon Strikes. These deal 1d4 fire damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, fire, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).
Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.name: Stance: Rain of Embers Stance

Stance: Ravel of Thorns.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.mHvkBdBN4gs6CH1g]{Ravel of Thorns}

A creature that starts its turn in the thorns takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area. The thorns are hazardous terrain. A creature takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -4)/4)+2)[piercing]] damage each time it moves into one of these squares. If any square the thorns grow on is water or soil, double the hazardous terrain damage for all thorns. If you move, the thorns disappear; new thorns grow at the end of your turn.

Level (+4) The damage increases by 1.
Stance: Ravel of Thorns.name: Stance: Ravel of Thorns

Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance.description:
You can make flowing wave attacks that deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the agile, disarm, finesse, nonlethal, trip, unarmed, and water traits.

While in Reflective Ripple Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed and Tripped.
Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance.name: Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance

Stance: Ricochet Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tRHjUCl0xqG97nok]{Ricochet Stance (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RsNvCSrCN7czHC0G]{Ricochet Stance (Rogue)}

While you are in this stance, any thrown weapons you use as part of a ranged Strike to deal bludgeoning or slashing damage immediately return to your hand, enabling you to use them for additional Strikes.

You must be within the weapon's listed range increment and have a hand free to catch the weapon. If you make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon outside of its listed range increment, it instead flies back toward you a number of feet equal to its listed range increment and then falls to the ground.
Stance: Ricochet Stance.name: Stance: Ricochet Stance

Stance: Rough Terrain Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.O0POcPD2aELYTcIK]{Rough Terrain Stance}

Each square adjacent to you becomes difficult terrain that matches the terrain attunement you gained (rime forms in an arctic terrain, momentary undergrowth shoots up in a forest terrain, and so on). You ignore this difficult terrain.
Stance: Rough Terrain Stance.name: Stance: Rough Terrain Stance

Stance: Rushing Goat Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQWGOK0lVmljCunm]{Rushing Goat Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are ramming horn attacks. These strikes deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage, are in the brawling group, and have the forceful, nonlethal, shove, and unarmed traits.

When you make a ramming horn attack and your previous action was to Climb, Stride, or Leap, you gain a circumstance bonus to damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice.
Stance: Rushing Goat Stance.name: Stance: Rushing Goat Stance

Stance: Sea Glass Guardians.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CAHJGt535l3Ai4cR]{Sea Glass Guardians}

You and your allies within your kinetic aura gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

If any creature affected is critically hit or critically fails at a saving throw against an attack, effect from an enemy, or hazard and remains above 0 HP, the guardians reach out to heal that creature. The creature regains 4d8+8 HP, and the impulse ends. If the creature is in water, the healing dice are d10s instead of d8s.

Level (+3) The healing increases by 1d8+4.

@Damage[((floor((max(12,@actor.level)-12)/3)+4)d8+(floor((max(12,@actor.level)-12)/3)*4+8))[healing]]{Leveled HP}
Stance: Sea Glass Guardians.name: Stance: Sea Glass Guardians

Stance: Shattershields.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QOnyOjncnw4tkTQp]{Shattershields}

You and allies in your kinetic aura gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
Stance: Shattershields.name: Stance: Shattershields

Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6cQSPqXoAO6oJl0i]{Shooting Stars Stance}

You can use your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with shuriken instead.
Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.name: Stance: Shooting Stars Stance

Stance: Six Pillars Stance.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hT0pVPqFuiEsmRb8]{Six Pillars Stance}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by using actions with the concentrate or manipulate traits. In addition, when you cast a spell that requires one or more actions while in this stance, your unarmed Strikes gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage.
Stance: Six Pillars Stance.name: Stance: Six Pillars Stance

Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UjEeHamC2C8JfgJz]{Sky and Heaven Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These unarmed attacks deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits.

You gain resistance 2 to electricity and resistance 2 to sonic damage. These resistances increase to 5 at 12th level and to 8 at 18th level.
Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.name: Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance

Stance: Spear of Doom.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wixpmBQ5dNm3VMFk]{Spear of Doom}

Your cursed weakness is equal to your level instead of half your level.
Stance: Spear of Doom.name: Stance: Spear of Doom

Stance: Steam Knight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7PjBANpMMoBxTYq3]{Steam Knight}

You shape your kinetic aura into swirling armor of steam that scalds your enemies and propels you on super-heated jet streams. A creature can take damage from Steam Knight only once per round. Your steam armor has the following effects.

  • You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.
  • When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, you can jump up to your Speed. You don't immediately fall at the end of a jump, provided you Leap again with your next action. If you Leap over a creature and come within 10 feet, that creature takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -6)/5)+2)d6[fire]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:kineticist|basic] save against your class DC.
  • At the start of each of your turns, you can emit steam as a free action. It deals @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -6)/5)+2)d6[fire]] damage to each creature in your kinetic aura with a @Check[reflex|against:kineticist|basic] save against your class DC. A creature that fails is also pushed 5 feet.

Level (+5) The fire damage from a jump or blast of steam increases by 1d6.
Stance: Steam Knight.name: Stance: Steam Knight

Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.rp1YauUSULuqW8rs]{Stance: Stoked Flame Stance}

You can make flashing spark attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. They are in the brawling group and have the forceful, nonlethal, sweep, and unarmed traits. If you have access to the flashing sparks' critical specialization effect, you can take an alternate effect instead: if your critical Strike dealt damage, the target takes 1d6 persistent fire damage.

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. If you have incredible movement, increase the benefit from incredible movement to a +15-foot status bonus plus 5 feet for every 4 levels beyond 3rd.

Special This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.
Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.name: Stance: Stoked Flame Stance

Stance: Stonestrike Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.k5S2a2a6o2GS5l01]{Stonestrike Stance}

You can make stonestrike attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage, are in the brawling group, and have the forceful, magical, and unarmed traits.
Stance: Stonestrike Stance.name: Stance: Stonestrike Stance

Stance: Strategist Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fJwsZM6WXwP8EStV]{Strategist Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to Reflex saving throws
Stance: Strategist Stance.name: Stance: Strategist Stance

Stance: Stretching Reach.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1yXmi6vKae6J1A0L]{Stretching Reach}

When you wield a melee weapon that requires two hands and doesn't have reach, the weapon gains a reach of 10 feet.
Stance: Stretching Reach.name: Stance: Stretching Reach

Stance: Stumbling Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7FRYyKXDKjGoANYj]{Stumbling Stance}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}.

The only Strikes you can make are stumbling swing unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits. If an enemy hits you with a melee Strike while in this stance, it becomes off-guard against the next stumbling swing Strike you make against it before the end of your next turn.
Stance: Stumbling Stance.name: Stance: Stumbling Stance

Stance: Talon Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IR95FFdO7MtC8C0E]{Talon Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are spinning talon unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 slashing damage, are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, sweep, and unarmed traits. You don't need a free hand to use spinning talon strikes.
Stance: Talon Stance.name: Stance: Talon Stance

Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2tUdsoPEnW9yS8so]{Tangled Forest Stance}

You can make lashing branch unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you're in Tangled Forest Stance and can act, every enemy in your reach that tries to move away from you must succeed at a Reflex save, Acrobatics check, or Athletics check against your class DC or be immobilized for that action. If you prefer, you can allow the enemy to move.
Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.name: Stance: Tangled Forest Stance

Stance: Tenacious Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5HZ4cYDowUw2oUbZ]{Tenacious Stance}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) and a +2 circumstance bonus to DCs against being Shoved and Tripped. However, you no longer negate your armor check penalty or Speed penalty for having a high Strength while in this stance.
Stance: Tenacious Stance.name: Stance: Tenacious Stance

Stance: Thermal Nimbus.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XJCsa3UbQtsKcqve]{Thermal Nimbus}

Choose cold or fire. You and allies in your kinetic aura gain resistance equal to your level to damage of that type.
Stance: Thermal Nimbus.name: Stance: Thermal Nimbus

Stance: Tiger Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VCjAlOvjNvFJOsG5]{Tiger Stance}

You can make tiger claw attacks. These deal 1d8 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

On a critical success with your tiger claws, if you deal damage, the target takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage.

As long as your Speed is at least 20 feet while in Tiger Stance, you can Step 10 feet.
Stance: Tiger Stance.name: Stance: Tiger Stance

Stance: Twinned Defense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xjLbabfyQzBNT4y1]{Twinned Defense (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.kTRGAST9J9ZxJZ4A]{Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)}

You constantly gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} action.
Stance: Twinned Defense.name: Stance: Twinned Defense

Stance: Twisting Petal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VN6Cws7BBta81AQ9]{Twisting Petal Stance}

You can make gale blossom strikes that deal 1d6 slashing damage. These strikes are in the brawling group and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, shove, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude DC to avoid being Shoved. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Perception DC to resist an opponent's Feint attempt.
Stance: Twisting Petal Stance.name: Stance: Twisting Petal Stance

Stance: Unified Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.M2fjNnh8yRAnGFyH]{Unified Stance}

When you enter this stance, your united companion gains the quickened condition and, when Commanded, can use the extra action to Stride or Strike.
Stance: Unified Stance.name: Stance: Unified Stance

Stance: Vitality-Manipulating Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tj79ePSD212EZjRM]{Vitality-Manipulating Stance}

You gain a vitality blast ranged unarmed Strike that deals 1d4 void damage, has a range of 30 feet, and has the unarmed and versatile vitality traits.

Additionally, when you use Stunning Fist, instead of saving against being stunned, you can choose to have the target make a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following results. You must choose to do this before the target rolls its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's muscles become temporarily weaker. For 1 round, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and any time it attempts to take an action with the manipulate trait, the action is disrupted unless it succeeds at a flat check with a DC equal to 5 + its enfeebled value.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute, the flat check is DC 11, and the target takes -10-foot status penalty to all Speeds for the duration.
Stance: Vitality-Manipulating Stance.name: Stance: Vitality-Manipulating Stance

Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IaiEZaA8erufMUCr]{Whirling Blade Stance}

All melee monk weapons you wield with the finesse trait gain the thrown 10 feet trait (unless they already have the thrown trait with a greater range).

Once you've made a thrown Strike with such a weapon, you can use the precision of your throw to make additional strikes with it, even from a distance. Start from the space of the previous Strike's target to determine the range increment and whether the new target has cover. At the end of your turn, the thrown weapon flies directly back to you in a straight line. If a solid barrier blocks its path, it falls to the ground after hitting the barrier.
Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.name: Stance: Whirling Blade Stance

Stance: Whirlwind Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wZZyasfIqwiJBQAQ]{Whirlwind Stance}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.
Stance: Whirlwind Stance.name: Stance: Whirlwind Stance

Stance: Wild Winds Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SkarN4VlNxSJSJNw]{Wild Winds Stance}

You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.
Stance: Wild Winds Stance.name: Stance: Wild Winds Stance

Stance: Winter Sleet.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xn6EaAbQlAB5ZGe6]{Winter Sleet}

Bone-chilling, swirling sleet surrounds you, cruel as deepest winter. Surfaces in your kinetic aura are coated in slippery ice. A creature that moves on the ice immediately falls unless it succeeds at an Acrobatics check or Reflex save against your impulse DC – 2. A creature that Steps or Crawls doesn't have to attempt a check or save. You're immune to this effect.

If a creature on the ice is critically hit by one of your water impulses or critically fails at a save against one, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.
Stance: Winter Sleet.name: Stance: Winter Sleet

Stance: Wolf Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AN9jY1JVcU20Qdw6]{Wolf Stance}

You can make wolf jaw unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 piercing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

If you're flanking a target while in Wolf Stance, your wolf jaw unarmed attacks also gain the trip trait.
Stance: Wolf Stance.name: Stance: Wolf Stance
